item.title: Manage libvirt with Python
item.description: If you don’t know what the libvirt is, then the official web page can clarify some things: The libvirt project is a toolkit to manage virtualization platforms. It is used by many applications and support multiple hypervisors like KVM, QEMU, Xen, VMWare and others. In this post I will show you how to interact with libvirt using Python and the KVM hypervisor, but first things first. What do you need to start?

item.title: Hello world!
item.description: This is my first blog entry! I will write here about multiple technological topics, but mainly about blockchain, scraping and virtualization. Expect texts written in english and spanish. Stay tuned!
